title: Netherstride Grimoire idea
body:
## https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvignette.wikia.nocookie.net%2Fleagueoflegends%2Fimages%2F4%2F40%2FNetherstride_Grimoire_item.png%2Frevision%2Flatest%3Fcb%3D20171201214140&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425 Netherstride Grimoire
>{{item:3108}} (900) + {{item:3113}} (850) + 650 Gold
Total 2400 Gold
>
+70 Ability Power
+7% Movement Speed
+10% Cooldown Reduction
>
**UNIQUE Passive - Razing:** 10% of the damage you deal to turrets and epic monsters is dealt again as bonus magic damage.
>
**UNIQUE Passive - Malice:** Gain 30% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds immediately after you kill an enemy champion or take down a turret or epic monster.

An item for mages.

replies.body: I like everything except for the cooldown reduction. However, if it wants to compete with other items in this day and age, it may need it.
